name: Stratoss
startIntroPart1: Stratoss will rise under your command.
declaringWar: Due to the current situation, we are forced to initiate hostilities.
attacked: The war will not weaken us, it will be your doom.
defeated: We did everything we could. Enjoy your victory.
introduction: La nación de Stratoss os saluda.
neutralNo: Sorry, this offer is not acceptable.
hateHello: What do you want to say that is worthy of our attention?
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was pointless anyway.
